sub_title: Experimental Scientist Temperature and Humidity at VSL National Metrology Institute
summary: Research engineer (PhD) with a strong technical background in experimental molecular physics. Loves building complex optical and optomechanical systems. Comfortable setting up complex data analysis frameworks in Python and Matlab to derive dependable results. Drove the planning, data collection and data analysis of the ultrafast solution X-ray diffraction subgroup for 6 years in a cooperative international environment.

profile_positions.description:
● Part of an academic research group focused on the structural characterization of biological and photo-activated molecular systems.
● Lead the planning of the ultra-fast solution X-ray diffraction team and coordinated the analysis of large experimental data sets with an international team.
● Integrated multiple data sources into a single data processing pipeline to produce an analyzable data set using image processing, outlier rejection, and data reduction.
● Presented the results of the project at several international conferences and
peer-reviewed articles through effective data visualization and communication.
profile_positions.title: Principal Research Engineer

profile_positions.description:
● Used ultra-fast optical lasers and X-ray Free Electron Lasers to uncover the physics of molecular reactions through visualizing molecular structure.
● Implemented multiple non-linear regression models and numerical algorithms (integrating Molecular Dynamics simulations) to analyse experimental data sets (Python, numpy, scipy, lmfit).
● Set up an international team of scientists, scheduled the activities and objectives for multiple projects at foreign synchrotron and X-ray Free Electron Laser facilities.
● Lead 4 successful international proposals for experimental lab time including a project plan, identifying and implementing risk mitigation, and experimental objectives.
● Research and Development (R&D) of a liquid jet nozzle. Produced the final product for a fraction of the cost (a factor 50 less) of the commercial equivalent.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
● Built ultrafast infrared infrastructure which increased the long-term productivity of my group involving 4 projects.
● The new set up increased data reliability by improving the signal processing method.
● Trained colleagues to operate experimental equipment I designed and built.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
2008–2013
● Synchronized UltraViolet and infrared pulsed laser systems to observe ultrafast molecular motion.
● Applied robust outlier rejection (MAD) and singular value decomposition techniques to decrease the uncertainty of the measured data (from >100% to 10 %) which lead to a peer-reviewed publication.
● Prototyping experimental equipment in close collaboration with a multidisciplinary team
including scientists and technicians, involving the use of CAD software.
profile_positions.title: PHD Researcher
